data.name: ComputerNotFoundInDirectory
data.value: The user {0} requested the password for computer {1} which was not found in the directory

data.name: UserHasRequestedPassword
data.value: {0} has requested the password for {1}

data.name: NoTargetsExist
data.value: The user {0} requested access to computer {1} but no targets exist for this computer

data.name: NoLapsPassword
data.value: The computer {0} requested by {1} did not have a LAPS password in the directory

data.name: AuthZFailedNoReaderPrincipalMatch
data.value: The user {0} requested access to computer {1} but does not match any of the reader principals that are allowed access to this computer

data.name: UnhandledError
data.value: An unhandled error occurred while processing the request for the password for {0} by user {1}

data.name: ClaimNotFound
data.value: No user claim was found with the type {0}

data.name: UserNotFoundInDirectory
data.value: The request could not be processed because the authenticated user was not found in the directory. Claim information: {0}

data.name: TargetRuleRequiresPasswordChange
data.value: Target rule requires password to change after {0}

data.name: UnknownComputerPlaceholder
data.value: unknown

data.name: AuditEmailSubjectFailure
data.value: LAP access denied for {user.SamAccountName} to {computer.SamAccountName}

data.name: AuditEmailSubjectSuccess
data.value: LAP for {computer.SamAccountName} accessed by {user.SamAccountName}

data.name: DefaultAuditFailureText
DefaultAuditSuccessText
AuthenticatedAndMappedUser
data.value: Successfully authenticated and mapped directory user {0}

data.name: AuthNProviderError
data.value: The authentication provider returned an error

data.name: AuthZCodeFlowError
data.value: An error occurred during the authorization code flow

data.name: RateLimitExceededIP
data.value: The user {0} on IP {1} has exceeded the maximum allowed number of requests per IP ({2} per {3} seconds)

data.name: RateLimitExceededUser
data.value: The user {0} on IP {1} has exceeded the maximum allowed number of requests per user ({2} per {3} seconds)

data.name: AuthorizationFailed
data.value: The user {0} is not authorized to access the computer {1}.
